Texts.Chs: 把^orange;加工台^reset;带给^green;维纳利斯^reset;。
厉害！这张卡片标明了我提到的设施所在的方位。你能在那里遇见许多研究员！另外，你可以使用^orange;三度仪^reset;来帮助你查看^green;任务和状态信息^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Great! This card contains directions to the facility I spoke of. There are many fellow scientists there with whom you can meet! Also, please use this handy ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset;, as it will help you access ^green;quests and status information^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 你的任务是制造一个^orange;加工台^white;，^green; 从你的制造菜单[C]制造一个^reset;来完成这个任务。
Texts.Eng: You've been tasked with creating a ^orange;Machining Table^white;. ^green;Build one on your default crafting menu [C]^reset; to complete this task.
